steel.title: Corten Steel S355J2W
steel.description: The Corten Steel S355J2W, also known as weathering steel, develops a natural patina layer that protects its surface and gives it a rustic, weathered appearance. This protective layer evolves over time, providing the material with unique characteristics, making it ideal for exterior applications. Corten steel in urban furniture harmoniously integrates into urban and architectural projects. Furthermore, this reduced maintenance makes it a sustainable choice, combining design and functionality exemplarily. It's the perfect option for those seeking to create environments with character and proven durability.

hpl.title: Phenolic Compact HPL
hpl.description: HPL (High Pressure Laminate) Compact Phenolic is a high-resistance material, ideal for applications requiring durability and low maintenance. This material offers excellent resistance to humidity, UV rays, and wear, maintaining its aesthetic characteristics over time. Its smooth and non-porous surface facilitates cleaning and hygienization, making it perfect for urban furniture exposed to the most adverse weather conditions. The manufacturing process under high pressure and temperature gives it exceptional mechanical properties, making it resistant to impacts and scratches.

antislip.title: Anti-slip Finish
antislip.description: The anti-slip finish provides greater safety to users, especially in humid conditions or wet surfaces. This special texture is applied to contact surfaces through a controlled technical process, ensuring superior grip and significantly reducing the risk of slipping. The treatment maintains the aesthetic properties of the material while providing enhanced safety features. This solution is particularly important in urban furniture, where user safety is a priority in all weather conditions.
